doc.field: MANAGEMENT SCIENCE MSAI> LOSS MAY TOP 20 CTS

Management Science America Inc, clarifying statements made earlier today, said its loss for the first quarter could exceed 20 cts a share because of non-recurring expenses associated with the acquisition of several companies, including Comserv Inc. Earlier today, the company told a meeting of investors here that the first quarter loss would be 20 cts a share.
Reuter
